item.title: 观看：英国航空公司（British Airways）的所有者国际航空集团（IAG）和法荷航空（Air France-KLM）在旅游需求持续增长的背景下对2024年作出了积极展望，但这家法荷航空公司在年终遇到的麻烦凸显了该行业面临的一些挑战。
item.description:
WATCH: 🛫 British Airways owner IAG and Air France-KLM gave a positive outlook for 2024 on the back of sustained travel demand, but the Franco-Dutch carrier's year-end troubles highlighted some of the challenges the sector faces https://t.co/N5qrmAbBCu pic.twitter.com/Ds54jew7Me

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 中国青年失业率居高不下，为雇主提供了大量可供选择的求职者，导致工资增长迟缓，并加剧了人们对中国可能难以提振家庭消费，从而稳定增长并拉动经济的担忧。
item.description:
High youth unemployment in China gives employers a large pool of candidates to choose from, keeping wage growth sluggish and cementing worries the country may struggle to boost household consumption enough to stabilize growth and lift the economy https://t.co/EHprFoBeAF

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰的企业面临着资本管制限制利润流动、难以获得保险以及美国财政和军事支持摇摆不定等问题。这些问题的累积使一些企业濒临倒闭边缘
item.description:
Corporates in Ukraine face issues with capital controls restricting the movement of profits, difficulties in getting insurance and wavering US financial and military support. The accumulation of problems has brought some to the brink of collapse https://t.co/1sXd2Kw1lB

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.description:

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 分析师和投资者称，汉莎航空很可能无法实现其 2024 年的利润率目标，因为这家德国航空公司正寻求达成新的、更高的薪酬协议，以结束被迫取消数千个航班的长期罢工。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Lufthansa will likely miss its 2024 profit margin goal as the German airline seeks to agree new, higher pay deals to end prolonged strikes, which have forced it to cancel thousands of flights, analysts and investors say. More here: https://t.co/FDKEH3ierq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024

item.title: 独家报道欧洲中央银行在未来几年将继续为市场利率设定 "下限"，但银行在决定自己需要多少流动性方面将发挥更大作用。更多内容请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: The European Central Bank will continue putting a ‘floor’ under market interest rates in the years to come, but banks will play a greater role in deciding how much liquidity they want. More here: https://t.co/rhgCjLrrnb

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) February 29, 2024
